mapper.select:
select count(*) from icstockbill a LEFT JOIN icstockbillentry b on a.fid = b.mid LEFT JOIN t_supplier c on a.suppId = c.fid LEFT JOIN t_settlement_method d on a.settId = d.fid LEFT JOIN t_department e on a.depaId = e.fid where a.billtype = '采购入库'
and (a.billNo like '%${str}%' or c.`name` like '%${str}%' or b.itemCode like '%${str}%' or b.itemModel like '%${str}%')

select count(*) from icstockbill a LEFT JOIN icstockbillentry b on a.fid = b.mid LEFT JOIN t_customer c on a.suppId = c.fid LEFT JOIN t_settlement_method d on a.settId = d.fid LEFT JOIN t_department e on a.depaId = e.fid where a.billtype = '销售出库'
and (a.billNo like '%${str}%' or c.`name` like '%${str}%' or b.itemCode like '%${str}%' or b.itemModel like '%${str}%')
